grape.general_graph.GeneralGraph.calculate_shortest_path¶

GeneralGraph.calculate_shortest_path()[source]¶

Choose the most appropriate way to compute the all-pairs shortest path depending on graph size and density . For a dense graph choose Floyd Warshall algorithm . For a sparse graph choose a BFS, SSSP based algorithm . For big graphs go parallel (number of processes equals the total number of available CPUs). For small graphs go serial.
